title: 'Nice Product but Received Different Color !!'
body: Nice product but received different color. I have ordered Sky Blue/Blue but received Grey one, little bit disappointed but product was good and fabric was soft & warm so didn't return/exchanged. BSB & Amazon needs to improve it's service for delivering right products to it's customer. Overall it's a good one and recommended to everyone who wants to purchase.
